website_summaries.verdict: A nice design available in various size options that offers a lovely way to lay your beloved pet to rest without spending a lot of money.
pros: Made of rosewood with an elegant carved border
Has a bottom opening that is discrete and closes securely
Comes in 4 sizes that accommodate even large animals
An affordable and beautiful resting spot for your pet's ashes
cons: Wood could chip if not handled with care
The downside to the sliding opening is that it's difficult to remove
but it's stable once in place

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This run box worked perfect when my Dad passed away. My mom was not prepared at all and during his wake she was concerned because she didn’t want him in the black box from the crematory, I ordered this a few days before his wake and it arrived and served as a nice resting place for my dads ashes. My mom actually liked the box enough that she decided to keep him in it. This is also extremely affordable for someone who is in a bind with furneral costs and funeral home urns are so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Tozer

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had thought to look on Amazon sooner
customer_reviews.text: We lost our son two years ago and what we had hoped to do with his ashes didn't work out and so we have been struggling ever since to come up with a solution that gives us peace. It was our eldest son that suggested searching on Amazon and to my amazement, I discovered this beautiful rosewood urn that is absolutely perfect. We have also ordered the brass plaque for the top and the price for both was less than $100 which I'm sure is a fraction of what it would have cost if we had gone through the mortuary.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Making Wise Preparations
customer_reviews.text: A BEAUTIFUL urn, reserved for myself, making it EASY for my family when the time comes. I've done a little woodcarving in years past and "this is me " ... I expected it to be somewhat "rustic" (which would have been fine), but indeed was surprised how smooth and finely finished it is. I didn't realize how beautiful Rosewood could be! I could not be more pleased! I really like the perfectly detailed slide drawer on bottom, which probably resolves some of the issues other reviewer's had.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Wynters

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about this, it was well protected in 4 layers. It looks beautiful! And can sit out without anyone getting creeped out.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to transport my husband to his final resting place and that included a plane and security. I had heard stories that some urns were difficult to pass through security. This one was not only beautiful but did the trick through security with no problem. Even the Cremation place said it was a nice urn, his were very expensive. This is well worth the money and is a perfect resting place for a loved one.
customer_reviews.author: ann la marr

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product for anyone who needs a lovely urn ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Urn to help with the cost of my grandmother's funeral expense, it was the least I could do since I could not attend the funeral. After the memorial I was receiving multiple messages informing me the Urn was gorgeous, lovely, and tasteful. I may even buy another for my other relative who recently passed away and we paid $150 for a cardboard box which is not at all gorgeous, lovely, or tasteful. I would recommend this product for anyone who needs a lovely urn to lay their loved one to rest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Pictures do not do this box justice. It’s so nice and the wood is beautiful. I bought it for one of our dogs that passed on and he got a really nice box. My problem now is a name plate that will serve the box nicely and not take away from it. It was packaged very well don’t get frustrated with the continuous next layer of protection because the box you see is really worth it. Buy it knowing you’re getting a beautiful box well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJo R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rosewood Urn - worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large but it just barely held the remains of 145lb person so need to order a size bigger I think. The remains wouldn’t fit in it in the plastic bag they came in, they had to be poured out into the wooden urn. The Urn was a beautiful Rosewood, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Earline Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Tight and the wood is fragile
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty box, for sure, but the cover is extremely tight, and, as others have reported, the wooden cover split and chipped when I resorted to using tools to open it. I tried to be as gentle as I could, but it was going to chip no matter what I did. I will look for something less fragile to keep my precious pup's ashes in.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great urn for the price. Originally purchased as a temporary holder until we could get something really nice. Quality is much better than expected. a A similar quality one was about $150-$200 at the funeral home so I definitely saved at least $100 and didn’t skimp on quality. We will be using this permanently since it’s so good we do not need to buy one from the funeral home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this beautiful box to hold my dad Ashes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this beautiful box to hold my dad Ashes.We had a Military Service for him. My Siblings were very happy and very satisfied with the detailing of the box. Held the ashes perfectly.No issues with size amount. Since the ashes are in a bag we slipped the bag directly into the box. Large enough plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and strong
customer_reviews.text: This urn fit my father's cremated ashes with a small bit of room to spare. The box has a sliding bottom for sturdiness and was a pretty display at his funeral. This price was a fraction of the price for similar items at the funeral home. I hope that I don't have to buy another any time soon but if I did, I would be getting this again.
customer_reviews.author: Funky Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality in any size
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased two burial urns, and a keepsake sized urn for my Father's cremains. After they were filled, there was a small bag of ashes left over. I didn't account for the cremation coffin, so back I went to Amazon. I ordered the large sized urn, and was not disappointed! Opening was not as difficult, as other reviews will have you believe. Starting at the notch, simply push outward and it will slowly slide open. Excellent quality, so this is a must-have!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Neal Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Men's human remains
customer_reviews.text: Great Urn However once opened to put remains in there is no protection to keep the ashes from leaking out. I had to put the ashes in a baggie first, then put inside box. Other then that it's very nice! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Crystal DD

customer_reviews.title: a lovely resting place for my little friend
customer_reviews.text: It was heartbreaking to lose our sweet puppy, but I'm so pleased to have a beautiful way to continue holding him memory closely. It's more beautiful than the generic urn/box that came from the crematorium. And I appreciate that there's a place to adhere an engraved plaque on the top. I will treasure this.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Hand Carved  .....
customer_reviews.text: The Wooden Urn is Beautiful. Price is great, compared to what the Funeral Homes want to charge a grieving family. Since it is an Urn and the purpose is to place our Loved one inside; a "Heavy duty" plastic bag should be included with the purchase. I had no problems with laying my Mother to Rest in this Urn.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Sigh
customer_reviews.text: I am so very disappointed in this product. The worse part is, I had it taken to Jamaica and so I wouldn't be able to return it but a refund would be helpful. I purchased this item to place the remains of my two babies in and it would then be placed on a table for the memorial service. However, I cannot get the bottom to open. As if dealing with the loss isn't enough. I am going to reach out to the seller. The item itself is well crafted and I want to love it, but I can't because I am unable to use it for its intended purpose. Saddened
customer_reviews.author: Cai-Jhana'e Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Open
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog. Beautiful and a great price. One drawback. I could not get it open. The bottom panel did not slide, not even budge. I finally took took a hammer and tapped a screwdriver into the slot and still it did not slide open. I tapped a little harder and damaged the wood. Got some slight movement, though, enough to wedge the screwdriver into the slit and open it a bit more, but still damaged the wood again. I am not going to be able to open it any farther without damage. For that reason, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to write too much on this, but what we received matched the pictures. I'm sure there's variability in what a family receives from the crematorium, but this urn was large enough to contain our loved one's remains. I ordered a custom brass plaque elsewhere to customize this, and it was easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Chipped, poorly made top
customer_reviews.text: Thcis is not the pattern I ordered, and the top decoration is chipped and looks cheap. There are cuts in all four corners of the border and chunks of the decorations missing. I will not be putting my cat's remains in it, it just looks like the sad, crappy version of another one I already have for a different pet. It doesn't seem to be returnable, so at least I only threw $15 down the drain. I am so very dissatisfied by this purchase. I don't even think I can donate it. It feels disrespectful to put a loved pet in this poorly carved box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are having loved one interred
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, but corner of top of box has a little split that needs wood filler to smooth it out. Carving okay, could be a little nicer. Please fix dimensions as you have 9" when it's 9.5". Someplaces are picky about dimensions. We are having loved one interred. Others may not like the imperfections I mentioned if on display at home.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Nice urn for my 75-lb dog
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money! I could put the whole box of ashes inside the urn without taking the original box apart and exposing the ashes. It shipped fast too. Definitely recommend but I hope no one needs it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a final Urn for my Dad's cremains. We even looked in a book from the funeral home but it was extremely expensive. Saw this online and my dad was a carpenter. When it arrived i was extremely surprised at the craftmanship and how heavy the box was. I am extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia brown

customer_reviews.title: Simple, beautiful, and very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: If you're having to even look at these, you're already in a unhappy place, but compared to buying this through a funeral home or crematory, you can't go wrong. Price is excellent, and quality is great-it really is a beautiful urn that is very simple/classy. It's a little disturbing though, when you get a typical Amazon delivery, and you realize you're opening the package, that will be the final resting place of your loved one :(
customer_reviews.author: MKG

customer_reviews.title: Made of solid wood
customer_reviews.text: Mom's ashes were put in a steel box. She has to be in wood to bury. I found this box on amazon and it's beautiful. It's just what I need very sturdy solid wood. Would recommend product & seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Musty
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken the box out of the wrapping, because of the strong musty smell when I opened the shipping box. What I could see of it looked nice enough, but with my asthma/allergies and contact dermatitis, I do not want to handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Issue
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks but just like how one of the reviewer here had mentioned, it’s like a Russian roulette, you will never know what quality/defect you will be getting. We received ours with a cracked bottom, and since time is of essence, we were stuck with it and had no time to return and get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Tevin

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looked good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough item to write a review. The box is very well made, and of good quality. It presented well at our services, and is a befitting final resting place.
customer_reviews.author: PacNW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our cremated 12 lb Bichon and it’s great. Nice sturdy box and beautiful design. We used the cricut to put her name and dates on it then polyed over it. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Long

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the pictures, get what they decide to send
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered not the item in the advertisement, thanks, time compressed and WRONG item delivered. Thanks. It's only for my Mothers remains. Not like it's important that I get a cheaper item that doesnt match what I ordered. Not like I dont have anything else to deal with now.
customer_reviews.author: John Joerg

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to metal urns. Smooth wood with a beautiful design. Woodwork could be a little bit cleaner, but no complaints for the price and quality. Thumbs up here!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great piece great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great urn its elegant and well made im very happy to have my mother remains in this beautiful urn
customer_reviews.author: Randypelton2

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect, the details are just like the ones in ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. The size is perfect, the details are just like the ones in the picture. My wife was pleased with the small box to put the remains of my faithful friend. Besides the seller attached the plaque before sending it, and it was done perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Not the urn I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a matching urn to the one I bought last year and although the picture on the website is the same it is not the urn that arrived. The one pictured is richer in color, has beautiful sloped sides and corners. The one I received is a block of wood--all square--light color-- not pretty at all. The quality of the bottom piece is quite poor. It has small pieces of the inside edge missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for a Larger Dog
customer_reviews.text: We got this to accommodate the ashes of one of our 85 lb dogs. It's a very pretty box and very reasonably priced. The ashes fit perfectly. The bottom slides open to put the 'bag' of ashes and stays securely closed. Will not open without pressure applied as slid open.
customer_reviews.author: trishb

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice container for cremains. Had smell of mildew when opened, but seemed to dissipate after a little while. Overall it was exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: lapointe20js

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We keep my fathers ashes in the heavy duty plastic bag from the crematory. The XL Box is a perfect for size for it with some space remaining. He weighed around 190 pounds to give you an idea. Lovely design and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: The wood carving is not crisp and when I opened the bottom once, the corners fell off! Don't waste your money. Spend a little bit more for something worthy of your loved one. I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Sample

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and good-looking box
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this box to hold the cremains of my Newfoundland dog. He weighed 130 lbs. at the time of his death, and it was a very tight squeeze to fit all of his ashes in the box. Box is nicely made and attractive. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store my Doberman's ashes. A bit large for my 95 pound Dobie but I prefer it being too large than too small. Nicely carved wood and would definitely use for human or large dog.
customer_reviews.author: Looker

customer_reviews.title: WOOD CREMATION URN
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother and it was beautiful. This was comparable to ones I saw at the morturary, almost exact, so upsetting how much they take advantage of those in their time sorrow. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie

customer_reviews.title: well made, lid slides easy to open
customer_reviews.text: looks well made. I bought one for my mother ( she died) and one to have on hand for the next time I need one. This is not the kind of item you should have to shop around for when you need it now. Amazon ships fast, but it is a good idea to get it before you need it.
customer_reviews.author: jon clemons

customer_reviews.title: Needed last minute and arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: My uncle passed and was a wood carver. I got this over a traditional urn and everyone thought it was nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Shipped very quickly
customer_reviews.text: One of the best urns I have seen. Great quality work for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C.

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, a nice alternative to your typical vase like urn. The box is very solid and sturdy with beautiful carving. The bottom slides open (kind of stiffly). I would very much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister for my brother in laws ashes! Visited her this week and saw the box for the first time! It is lovely
customer_reviews.author: jean Micou

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship poorly done
customer_reviews.text: The craven on the urn is poorly done, I could open the bottom for the ashes to be put inside. I am returning this item and would not order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This urn is not large enough for an adult.
customer_reviews.text: The urn it self was very nice and well made. The overall rating was only a three because of the small size. My loved one only weighed 180 pounds but the ashes did not come close to fitting into this urn. This urn most likely would only fit someone weighing under 100 pounds or less.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good craftsmanship, nicely finished.
customer_reviews.text: This urn is well crafted and nicely finished. It is way less likely to be tipped over than traditional urns. It opens with a sliding panel on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: JeffG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of this urn, it’s very solid and the back panel isn’t too flimsy. It’s very well crafted. However, I ordered the rose/floral bordered urn and got one with daisies (or something, I attached a picture) instead so -1 Star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Box
customer_reviews.text: Only returned, because the size I got was too small.
customer_reviews.author: pisceankarma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to get it same day. Did not come with the black protective cover shown on the picture, it’s not a big deal but it would have been nice to have that while I transport it to it’s destination. All in all it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Great box - great price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Box looked great. Very pleased! Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was too small!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad's ashes. He was 5' 10" 190 lbs and this box was too small for his ashes. I have to return and buy something else for him. Very disappointing. It said large adult on the description. I bought this because of the price, as we are burying him at a veterans cemetery and didn't want to spend too much. Lesson learned, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn! We used this for a small dog, and it is just a beautiful resting place for her. It looks like it is very well made too.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo F. Plascencia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike to this product was when I opened the outer box it stunk so horribly I had to leave it open for a few days before I could send it to my dad. Other than that, this product was beautiful and exactly what my dad wanted for my sisters ashes. Worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: one of the better bingo games

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and not damaged. Item is as described. Very good quality. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: Simple, attractive pet ash urn.
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far. Looks nice and decorative. Goes well with another we previously purchased from a veterinarian’s office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful urn. Only one problem. You keep sending me the large and I wanted the X-Large..... I have ordered it separately today.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I also bought this one and the tree of life one. My mother-in-law’s half of my husbands ashes are in here. His weight was 190lbs. Ashes fit perfect. Box is beautiful and can be placed anywhere
customer_reviews.author: lorraine sikorski

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for our beloved pup's ashes. It exceeded my expectations it is even more beautiful in person and very well made. Love it! <3
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Scott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They are so pretty. This is perfect forwhag i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, handmade box
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. We picked it for my Pet's ashes. It did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Monica W. Munn-Schreml

customer_reviews.title: Not a piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Try telling me the same exact box for $380 very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The woodwork on this small urn is absolutely amazing! Very detailed and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Mit

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but too small
customer_reviews.text: Medium was too small for a 5'3", 115# individual. The crematorium returned the remains after the purchase return date lapsed so I'm out $50.
customer_reviews.author: Cruise Mama

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and nicely made. My kitty passed and I had her cremated and put her in this.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Davidson

customer_reviews.title: These boxes are beautiful, what I wanted & more
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are beautiful, what I wanted & more. Their service was wonderful. They were courteous, helpful, & compassionate. The boxes arrived quickly, same day we got our pets' ashes. I would definitely recommend this company. You'll never find anyone more considerate of your feelings & wishes during a time when it's hard to make decisions. At the same time I purchased a plaque. See review for that. Thank you Bogati.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for storing cremated ashes
customer_reviews.text: I used this beautiful carved box to store some of my son's ashes and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: I can depend on the fine quality of the products you sell.
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship of the carving is meticulous, and the wood grain is especially lovely and tastefully varied. My beloved husband passed as a result of the covid-9 virus. The urn is for his crematory ashes. In the future, mine will combine with his and we will be placed in a niche together once again.
customer_reviews.author: Jean DeRiggi

customer_reviews.title: My husband can rest in peace
customer_reviews.text: My husband passed away the end of June and I needed to get an urn for his ashes. The funeral parlor he was cremated In showed me several versions of urns, however they were too expensive so I went to Amazon and was delighted to find this urn! The color of the wood and the hand carving made it just the thing I was looking for. I'm sure that my husband is very happy with my selection too. The grain of the wood is awesome & the hand carving on the wood is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Delphine (Dee) A. Richert

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The bottom was easy to open. The carving is nice but not symmetrical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality in product
customer_reviews.text: I needed an urn for my grandmas ashes, I needed it in a weeks time, it came earlier than that with prime which was great. The box was made beautifully with hand carved flowers. The bottom of the box was very sturdy and easily opens and closes.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful resting place
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Beautiful. Exactly what Was needed. Now my pet is at rest. However, the bottom would not slide open. Took 2 hours just to remove the bottom. Apparent the fit is just a little too tight. To even slide it closed took a great deal of force.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cobb

customer_reviews.title: R I P
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I needed size is right on workmen ship is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chef D

customer_reviews.title: Small but beautiful keepsake urn
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I actually expected after reading several reviews with complaints on how small it is
customer_reviews.author: linewife1393

customer_reviews.title: the carving on the top is uneven.  One side is wide than the other.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product. Thought the bottom was a little flimsy. Then I notice that the imprint was off sized. One side of the design was broader than the other. I used this wood carved to put my husband's cremated ashes in.
customer_reviews.author: katherine villa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wood and carvings are pretty. Excellent price. Delivery was fast and on time.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Customer feedback misled me to purchase this Urn.
customer_reviews.text: Customer feedback misled me to purchase this Urn. Too small for humans. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Brooklyn Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this box for my stepfather's cremains. It is very nice & was exactly what we wanted. Not plain but not too fancy. It was the perfect size. My stepfather weighed approximately 185 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fair price
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and design. I bought this for a friend who lost his wife, I know he'll be happy with it
customer_reviews.author: SPommier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was just the right size and a beautiful display
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It was very pretty and much more cost effective than something from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my mother's ashes. It was very pretty and much more cost effective than something from the crematorium.
customer_reviews.author: w strong

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product in our time of need. Beautiful craftsmanship resulting and attractive finished product.
customer_reviews.author: david wright

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL URN
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this product. It is beautifully made and the size was just right.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful box
customer_reviews.text: This box was used to hold my husband's ashes for burial in a National Cemetery. It was the perfect choice. I received several compliments on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence D. Gaddy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a good price with fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a good price with fast shipping. I was especially impressed that they called me to double check the inscription instructions that I had provided, as I had made a spelling error. I am very glad that they double checked. And the order came much sooner than promised.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wagner

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but still good
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than I thought but it worked well and was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my brother that passed away and was cremated it is very nice lookinng box. His wife was very pleased with the box
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but needs a better seal on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The inlay and wood is beautifully done, and, viewed from every angle, is both classy yet not overdone. However, the plastic plug underneath doesn't fit very well, and left me wondering if it might come off after the ashes were inside. I was forced to tape over the plug to make sure. Maybe if the plug itself was made of rubber or cork rather than plastic, it would be more secure. It's a small issue and could be easily corrected in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Harry D. Thurlo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with what this represents - expected less for the money Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.author: unhappy 2012

customer_reviews.title: My family liked it!!
customer_reviews.text: My family liked it. Xl size was perfect for our mother
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great choice.
customer_reviews.text: An attractive & well made container to hold my brother's ashes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful and even nicer than I thought it would be.....
customer_reviews.author: Annette Caforio

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: Would not fit a 130 lb person. I figured my brother was "medium" sized but only half of him would fit in this. Now he's split between this and a plastic bag. I guess he doesn't care but still.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase for the price. Well made, attractive, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: A loving memorial to our mother.
customer_reviews.text: For our mothers ashes. Much better than the metal box urn she was in. This Rosewood urn was carved beautifully. Able to personalize it with a loving message in her memory.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say how beautiful this is...we had a label engraved and added it to it and it came out so nice...
customer_reviews.author: Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It's as beautiful as it looks. My only complaint is that it doesn't sit evenly (one corner is higher than the others). Still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Well made and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box used to place my husbands ashes after cremation!
customer_reviews.author: Vonda Bowman
